formalText: Patient name is June
This all began about six months ago.
she has been hyper-vigilant about noticing her heart symptoms.
We will meet again, perhaps next week and look again more carefully at some of the treatment options and think together about which might suit her best.
The same thing that she has seen Doctor Jones about, her heart.
Her heart starts to race and race and race and she couldn't get my couldn't get her breath.
She was just like gasping for breath.
Then she started to get chest pains.
When asked to explain her situation in her words, she said, "It's just I keep getting these situations where my heart starts to really really race
Boom, right I get chest pain.
I can't catch my breath.
It's making me feel feel funny talking to you about it.
Right and so my heart starts to race.
I can't get my breath and then I get chest pains and I get very afraid.
I'm going to have a heart attack
I can feel it starting to come up when we talk about it"
It has been  going for about six months.
Some problems at work seemed to start it off
"I've felt more stress about work than I normally do and basically I was just trying to get into town one day on a off day and it was very hot"
"It was awful it really it was really really frightening"
Because of work, she says, "I was under a lot of pressure that could be affecting me".
Had never experienced this before
No one has explained to her about anxiety and panic attacks.
She started to try and avoid situations where  she might feel the symptoms.
"I can't get into town now without my husband taking me cuz because my husband has to take me to and from work and I also thought I shouldn't do anything to put any strain on my heart at all
So I don't do much exercise or anything at the moment and other things as well".
No sex life.
"I just feel that I shouldn't, you know do anything like that because it might put too much strain on me
my husband's getting really fed up with it to be honest doctor".
She now doesn't go out to town by herself
She is not socializing like she used to.
She is avoiding things like exercise and things like sex which is having a bit of a taking its toll on her relationship.
She won't walk to town anymore.
Her dad died of a heart attack at 72 .
here have been several heart attacks in her family.
She had an ECG and results came back normal
